author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three minor girls from Villupuram who were found stranded in front of the Coimbatore Railway Junction were rescued by the police and sent to a home at Ganapathy in the city for temporary shelter.

Race Course police who saw them around 4 a.m. during the night patrolling said that the trio – aged 16 and 17-years-old – included a pair of twins.
title: Stranded minor girls rescued
